text: Bertil Martinus Grov (born November 3, 1974) is a retired archer from Norway. Grov competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics, 1996 Summer Olympics, and the 2000 Summer Olympics.Martinus GrovMartinius GROV == References == Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian archers Category:Olympians for Norway
title: Martinus Grov
